name: Rayman Raving Rabbids TV Party
description:
Join the rabbids in the wackiest TV party ever! Play over 50 hilarious
games to get the rabbids out of your TV - including the first game you
can play with your butt on the Wii Balance Board! Monster truck race,
surf through space, and dance with those wacky rabbids and up to seven
friends in the craziest party game ever. Up to4 players simultaneously
and 8 players alternating.
